title: Cleaveland

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player each night, dealing a Basic attack to them. You will {not} deal an Unstoppable attack to them and all the players who visit them and all the players they visit and you will {not} gain all immunities as well as total death immunity for the night.
- **Cleave** during the day.

desc:
Post 883
*It will {not} take more than a second.*
